column4: dont remember 6.06 install but if swap already exists cant you just leave it as is
I set up the swap partition using the ubuntu partition manager during install. It seems ok until I click next and it displays 0kb for the partition
is this a second install on another partition
Second install? I have windows already installed if that's what you mean.
you r trying to install ubuntu and dual boot Win and Ubuntu correct
correct
when you said you set up swap did you use parted to create swap and space for ubuntu
I partitioned the drive into three: windows, empty partition, and ubuntu partition. I then tried to create a swap partition from the ubuntu partition.
what size is the empty partition
approximate size
14.65gb, ubuntu: 8.74GB
is your name registered so we can go to a private channel?
no
how do I register it?
first go to node you logged into  then  these two commands   /nick  thejoe   then  /msg nickserv register  <passwd>
<passwd> is a password of your choosing remember it
be aware that   thejoe  may be registered and you will have to alter or take on a new identity
registered
ok stand by
we now have a pvt channel go there
sorry one more step     /msg  nickserv identify  <passwd>
let me change names to my registered name be right back
ok
